name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Full Stack Engineer with 13+ years of experience in delivering high-performance applications, specializing in **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, and **React** along with **Next.js** and **Vercel** for building responsive designs. Demonstrates expertise in **Serverless Architecture** and **Tailwind CSS**, ensuring optimal UI/UX through Figma and responsive design practices.
Adept at leveraging AI technologies, including **LLM**, **OpenAI**, and **Context Engineering**, to develop innovative solutions in automation systems and image/audio/video generation. Skilled in creating robust **data pipelines** and managing **job queues** for efficient **async operations**.
Proficient in backend development using **PostgreSQL** and **Supabase**, and experience in implementing APIs for seamless integration. Additionally, knowledgeable about **AI cost optimization** strategies and familiar with **vector databases** and **embeddings**.
Possesses a strong foundation in compliance, ensuring solutions meet industry standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS. Excels in employing modern deployment practices, including CI/CD pipelines on cloud platforms like AWS and Azure.

experience.responsibilities:
• Developed dynamic front-end applications using **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, and **React 17–18**, while ensuring optimal UI/UX through **Tailwind CSS** and prototypes designed with **Figma**.
• Engineered serverless architectures leveraging **AWS Lambda** and **Azure Functions**, improving deployment efficiency by **30%**.
• Designed responsive web applications with **Next.js** integrated with **Vercel**, enabling deployment at **scale** for high traffic applications.
• Created robust APIs and data pipelines utilizing **PostgreSQL** and **Supabase**, facilitating efficient **Async Operations** and job queues for seamless data handling.
• Implemented AI-driven features including context engineering and embeddings through advanced integration with **OpenAI** and **Anthropic**, enhancing user engagement and personalization.
• Spearheaded the automation of data pipelines and systems that resulted in a **40%** reduction in manual processes and improved data accuracy.
• Collaborated on large-scale projects incorporating AI elements such as **Image Generation** and **Video Generation**, revolutionizing user interactions.
• Championed the integration of advanced security measures and accessibility within applications, ensuring compliance with industry standards and enhancing overall user experience.
• Developed comprehensive documentation and REST APIs for team collaboration and longevity of projects, establishing clear communication among potential stakeholders.
• Optimized system performance through diligent monitoring using performance metrics, achieving a **25%** increase in application efficiency.

Utilized **JavaScript** and **TypeScript** to modernize core financial platforms, migrating to microservices architecture with **Node.js** (NestJS/Express) and **Python** (FastAPI, Django), enhancing scalability for high-volume transactional systems.

Built interactive front-end applications with **React** (18), **Vue 3**, and **Next.js**, utilizing **Tailwind CSS** for responsive design and integrating **Redux Toolkit** for state management, achieving user satisfaction scores of over **95%** in UX testing.

Delivered real-time analytics dashboards leveraging **React**, **D3.js**, and **Power BI Embedded**, which improved operations teams' insight into transactions and anomalies by providing data overlays with refresh times of under **10 seconds**.

Designed and deployed a robust event-driven architecture using **Kafka**, **RabbitMQ**, and **Azure Service Bus**, ensuring asynchronous communication for critical workflows including payments and alerts, reducing latency by **30%**.

Developed ETL pipelines for ingesting financial data sourced internally and from third parties using **Python**, **Apache Airflow**, and **Azure Data Factory**, achieving batch and real-time processing efficiencies that cut processing times by **25%**.

Constructed machine learning models for fraud detection utilizing **scikit-learn**, **XGBoost**, and **Azure ML**, enabling proactive identification of suspicious activities in transactions and user behavior, with accuracy improvements yielding a **15%** reduction in false positives.

Created machine learning pipelines designed for real-time credit scoring and churn prediction by leveraging **MLflow** and **Airflow**, seamlessly integrating model inference into backend services, contributing to an increase in predictive accuracy by **20%**.

Utilized **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, and **React (18)** to design and implement interactive frontend applications for a responsive e-commerce platform, enhancing user experiences with fast load times and mobile-first design.
Developed server-side applications leveraging **Next.js** and **Vercel** to facilitate dynamic content handling and deployment, improving scalability and performance by **30%**.
Architected and optimized data management systems using **PostgreSQL** and **Supabase**, ensuring reliable data integrity and seamless async operations, achieving a **40%** reduction in query response time.
Created robust and intuitive UI/UX designs with **Figma** and **Tailwind CSS**, focusing on responsive design principles for enhanced accessibility and mobile engagement, compliant with WCAG 2.1 standards.
Implemented automation systems and job queues to streamline backend processes, contributing to a more efficient development lifecycle and increasing deployment frequency by **50%**.
Designed and integrated serverless architecture using **APIs** and **automation frameworks**, aiming for lower operational costs and faster iteration on product features.
Explored and integrated AI technologies, including context engineering with **OpenAI**, to enhance user interaction and personalize experiences, which led to a **20%** boost in user retention.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to develop and optimize data pipelines for real-time analytics, improving decision-making processes and operational efficiencies.
Executed version control and code management practices with **Git**, ensuring collaboration efficiency and code quality across the development team.
Investigated and leveraged automated video and audio generation technologies for enhanced user-generated content capabilities, aligning with emerging trends in media engagement.
